name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: So even now, as I work to craft words, it is my deepest hope that even when I speak, I am reminded that to breathe and be here at all is a miracle all on it‚Äôs own. Whether ‚Äúbuilding a legacy‚Äù or not, to be here at all IS the legacy. https://t.co/d1U1a5gMqB

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: I‚Äôm not saying that one shouldn‚Äôt work toward a legacy. I‚Äôm not saying we shouldn‚Äôt work to find positive meaning, but I also think we must remember: just by being here is a legacy all on its own. No additional work needed.

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: If that ancestor of mine, shackled down inside of that ship knew I was standing here years later‚Ä¶if she knew of me‚Ä¶I don‚Äôt think she would expect me to be working toward some positive reframing or whatever in this moment. I think she‚Äôd just be glad to know I was alive.

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: In that moment, I asked myself ‚Äúwhy this image? Why now? Can‚Äôt I just enjoy this moment at the beach?‚Äù - I found myself wanting to push back the image quickly. To reframe. To look ahead. But I couldn‚Äôt. And it was then I realized:

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: I once stood on the shore in The South looking toward the Atlantic. I‚Äôm a visual person and see images everywhere. And that day, I saw an image of a slave ship coming toward me. And to be honest, I was angry with myself.

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: Some of us come from a line of ancestors who, just a few generations ago, worked without pay, didn‚Äôt get credit for their work‚Ä¶there are no birth certificates. No paper-trail of their lives. Their erasure was the goal‚Ä¶There‚Äôs this pressure to make their sacrifices ‚Äúworth it.‚Äù

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: Sometimes I wonder, for some of us, if the pressure to ‚Äúbuild a legacy‚Äù comes from wanting to find meaning from a place of feeling like our ancestors had the fullness of their legacies robbed from them.

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: I will continue to remind myself ‚Äî and others ‚Äî that we are not lightbulbs and were never meant to burn like them. We‚Äôre more like candles, burning slowly for sometime, but eventually the wax melts to the point that we must let the fire fade and ignite the flame later.

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: I am not perfect at saying ‚Äúno‚Äù to literally everything that leads me to burnout because for a lot of it, I‚Äôm still learning in real-time. But over the past few years I have been trying to reduce the ‚ÄúI feel like I SHOULD do this‚Äù whenever I can, and it HAS helped!

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: I don‚Äôt use the word ‚Äúfight‚Äù lightly either. It‚Äôs hard. It‚Äôs hard to explain over and over WHY being on video or a phone call or a ‚Äúlet‚Äôs just hangout‚Äù takes me hours upon hours to recover from. But whether or not someone else understands, I will continue to honor my capacity.

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: This has been the most apparent in autistic burnout, which often comes from a mismatch of my abilities with life‚Äôs expectations. I‚Äôm learning to fight for more recovery time and say ‚Äúno‚Äù more often.

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: What I have learned about burnout is that a lot of times my burnout comes from me trying to burn too brightly for stuff that wasn‚Äôt right for me in the first place.

Dear Child,
For you, I seek safety.
For you, I seek welcoming spaces.
For you, I join
in the collective 
resilience and strength
in the fight against 
all-too powerful forces
that try to hinder you
from being unapologetically you.

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: It was scary to try again especially after having my experienced invalidated by a professional that I trusted and I just want to name how hard it truly is. It's so hard to reach out, but I just want you to know: you are worthy of support and the time it takes to find that support

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: My process of getting diagnosed involved Googling and finding someone who worked with adults with autism in my area. This was not easy because there were not many in this state from what I could find, but thankfully, I worked up the courage to inquire when I found someone.

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: These are just a few of many of my experiences (and I outlined a lot more in the blog post) but I'm sharing it as a way to practice courage and also, just to have this out there to help in case it helps one other person feel seen.

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: there are SO many different versions of this for autistic people but for me, as a Black woman (especially as a teen) I was teased for having "nerdy" interests and just decided to keep them to myself because they weren't just hobbies for me. LOTR helped me understand the world.

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: based on his travels and how he was inspired to write Lord of the Rings. I never shared this with anyone and it was just a part of my experience...I have other special interests now that are similar, but they are hard to share because in the past, this opened me up to teasing...

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: 4. Special interests. Special interests are different than hobbies in the way that they help me regulate and function.  For instance, in college, I briefly lived where JRR Tolkien  lived and I studied a ton about LOTR during that time, learning my way around the city...

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: 3. Executive functioning. Example: remembering to wash my face at night takes a lot of effort because by that point in the day, with sensory overload, and the work I've done all day to function socially and with work has drained me.

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: 2. Social/communication - Example: It takes a lot of prep  to be able to communicate with others, even friends & family. I prep questions, stories, and jokes ahead of time. I miss social queues and a lot of in-the-moment nuances that happen in conversations (including texts).

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet:
Knowing that I am autistic, I know now have language for the following: 

1. Sensory - sensory processing and overload impacts my ability to function on a daily basis. Example: Loud music or bright lights can shut me down for long periods of time.

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet:
2. I'm new to sharing this and was afraid to share at first for fear of getting terms or definitions wrong...so just keep that in mind as you read :) I'm still learning how to talk about it myself
3. I also wrote a blog w/ more detail: https://t.co/Y64n14nlfx

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet:
...Now before I go any further, a few disclaimers:
1. A lot of autistic people hear ‚Äúbut you don‚Äôt look/seem/act autistic‚Äù due to assumptions/lack of knowledge. Autism is very complex and those words can be hurtful.

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: Last year, after seeing TikTok videos of other women with autism who were diagnosed as adults, I got the courage to seek help again. And that's a huge reason why I'm sharing. Social media can be really helpful in that way. Even if I don't have the "answers," stories matter.

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: Years ago, I asked my doc if he could refer me to a specialist because I thought I might be on the autism spectrum. Without even looking up from his clipboard he smirked and said ‚ÄúYou have nothing to worry about. You‚Äôre perfectly normal.‚Äù I wish I didn‚Äôt take his word, but I did.

name: Morgan Harper Nichols
description: Autistic Artist + Writer Feat‚Äôd: Target, Anthropologie, TJ Maxx, Barnes & Noble, Starbucks & more. My new book Peace Is A Practice available for pre-order now:
tweet: Last Saturday, after a very long journey, I was officially diagnosed with autism and I just want to share my experiences here for anyone else out there whom it could help (a lengthy thread)

the one leader

what made her beautiful 
was not her appearance

‚Äúhow do you write so much everyday?‚Äù

I get asked that a lot:

Instead of seeing writing/creativity as  ‚Äúquality over quantity‚Äù I see it as ‚Äúquality FROM quantity.‚Äù

I overwrite, edit later. I don‚Äôt stop when I make a mistake. I write letters to people. I write down observations. https://t.co/qzAoDz45zx
